description: Mapping from permissions to the actions they grant at each access level (read, write, create, update, delete)

schema.name: permission_set_id
schema.description: The parent permission set ID (e.g., essentials, safety)

schema.name: sub_permission_id
schema.description: The sub-permission ID for granular write permissions (e.g., drivers.settings.name). Empty for parent-level actions.

schema.name: access_level
schema.description: The access level that grants this action: read, write, create, update, or delete

schema.name: action
schema.description: The action string that this permission grants (e.g., driver.read)
